Ordinary Calculator - A Simple Calculator with Hidden Features

The Ordinary Calculator extension is a sleek and intuitive calculator that also hides some unique functionalities. While it works like a standard calculator, it offers more for those who know the secret!

Key Features:

	•	Basic Calculator: Perform everyday calculations with ease. The interface is simple, clean, and efficient.
	•	Hidden Bookmark Feature: Want to access your favorite web pages directly from the calculator? Enter ‘1111’ into the calculator and then press the ‘fn’ button to unlock a hidden bookmarking feature where you can save and manage your favorite web pages.
	•	Side Panel Mode: The Ordinary Calculator extension runs seamlessly in Chrome’s side panel for quick access while browsing. If the side panel doesn’t automatically open when you click the extension icon, simply right-click the icon and select “Open in Side Panel” to access the calculator.

How to Use:

	1.	Calculator Mode: Just click on the extension icon to open the calculator in the side panel (or right-click and select “Open in Side Panel” if it doesn’t automatically open).
	2.	Bookmark Mode: Enter 1111 in the calculator, and you’ll be taken to a special bookmark manager where you can add, edit, and delete your favorite websites.

Enjoy the simplicity of a basic calculator, with the bonus of a hidden bookmarking feature that you can access anytime! Whether you’re calculating numbers or managing your favorite web pages, the Ordinary Calculator has you covered.
